description:
Kyouhei is a single dad living with his daughter, Tsumugi.  He`s busy and doesn`t know how to cook, so he feeds her nothing but frozen foods and lunches from the convenience store.  But when a chance encounter with a student of his gives him the opportunity to feed her a home-cooked meal, he leaps at it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Uniforme et riz à la marmite
